suppress.notes: file: rewrite-jhipster-1.6.0.jar vuln id: cpe:2.3:a:jhipster:jhipster:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:* package: pkg:maven/org.openrewrite.recipe/rewrite-jhipster@1.6.0 sev: CRITICAL CVE-2019-16303 False positive. CVE refers to jhipster before 6.3.0, but rewrite-jhipster is not jhipster itself. CPE is too broad, apparently matching any dependency that includes jhipster in the name.
